name: steem-smartvotes
description: Node/web library for Smartvotes: a vote delegation system for STEEM blockchain

scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && npm run convert-schema-to-json
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run watch-debug
scripts.build-schema: npm run convert-schema-to-json && npm run build-schema-docs
scripts.build-schema-docs: typedoc --out schema/docs --mode file --readme schema/README.md --name "Steem Smartvotes operation schema" schema/

author: JÄ™drzej Lewandowski <jedrzejblew@gmail.com> (https://jedrzej.lewandowski.doctor/)
